#summary Extended Android Binding library that supports ICS+ devices

= Introduction =

AndroidBindingV30 is an extension to original Android Binding library that added supports to 4.0+ features. It provides binding to ActionBar and compatibility v4 package. 

= Build =

Source available in trunk (under AndroidBindingV30). It also requires the original AndroidBinding Library. To export as Jar, use [http://fjep.sourceforge.net/ FatJar] to combine both AndroidBinding and AndroidBindingV30 into one.
